thread.section_title: Bento&co評価／レビュー | お客様は Bento&coの評価／レビューをしました。 | bentoandco.com
thread.title: Karen Monaco
thread.title_full: Bento&co について 投稿者 Karen Monaco

author: Karen Monaco
title: Karen Monaco
text: I have ordered several times and the delivery always exceeds expectations. Each bento box is specially wrapped, it is like opening little presents. I love experiencing a small aspect of another culture. The descriptions are in Japanese and sometimes the carton is packed with a sheet of Japanese newspaper. My kids love the cute accessories. The fact that it takes a bit longer to arrive from Japan heightens the anticipation.
